entries.m25v: Stop! Give me a head start and let's make this a fair fight!
entries.m25s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m25d: A bounty is hereby issued by an anonymous group of surveyors on a violent claim jumper. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m24v: Oh ho, a bounty hunter! Think you're tough enough to take me down?
entries.m24s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m24d: A bounty is hereby issued on a loan shark by an alliance of his debtors. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m23v: Son of a gundark! You found me!
entries.m23s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m23d: A bounty is hereby issued on a fugitive vandal with well-connected enemies. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m22v: I killed two security officers when I escaped, and I'm going to kill you, too!
entries.m22s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m22d: A bounty is hereby issued on a lesai dealer who escaped from planetary authorities. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m21v: You wouldn't kill me over a couple of binary load lifters, would you?
entries.m21s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m21d: A bounty is hereby issued on a droid rustler. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m20v: resources. Those dumb hicks probably didn't even notice the pun.
entries.m20s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m20d: A bounty is hereby issued on a confirmed moisture thief who has fled from Tosche Station on Tatooine. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m19v: You're the laser-brain they sent after me? Bring it on, bounty hunter!
entries.m19s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m19d: A bounty is hereby issued on a notorious brawler known to have drunkenly assaulted citizens in three settlements. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m18v: Listen, bounty hunter! I'll get you a brand new flash speeder if you let me go!
entries.m18s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m18d: A bounty is hereby issued on a fugitive speeder thief who escaped from planetary law enforcement. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m17v: Sithspit! I can't believe you chased me this far over a couple of sabacc cheats!
entries.m17s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m17d: A bounty is hereby issued on a fugitive sabacc hustler who has escaped planetary law enforcement. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m16v: I just wanted my company to treat its droid workers better. They want you to kill me just for that? Well, it's not happening!
entries.m16s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m16d: A bounty is hereby issued on a provocateur who attempted to foment unrest among factory droids. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m15v: I -- I expected you, sooner or later. I've been living a nightmare ever since I stole those secrets. But I'm not going quietly!
entries.m15s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m15d: A bounty is hereby issued on a proven industrial spy. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m14v: I didn't kill her stupid voorpak! My pet graysor got loose and saw it running by. Attacking it was pure instinct. You're working for an addled aristocrat with too much money and too few brain cells!
entries.m14d: A bounty is hereby issued on the killer of a beloved pet. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m13v: That was twenty years ago! I can't believe that incredible jerk is still angry about one indiscreet remark!
entries.m13s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m13d: A bounty is hereby issued on a citizen who has slandered the reputation of a good woman. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m12v: Chordak is the Rodian pirate who attacked my ship. They killed everyone, but I escaped. I wanted revenge on Chordak. I was trying to kill him, not his kids!
entries.m12s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m12d: A bounty is hereby issued on the killer of several Rodian children. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m11v: huh? Well, you can tell my
stinking friends that they never knew the evil heartbreaker I married!
entries.m11s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m11d: A bounty is hereby issued on the spouse of a deceased law enforcement officer. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m10v: I never thought they'd kill me for stealing just one little distillation process!
entries.m10s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m10d: A bounty is hereby issued on a former chemist employed by Cassandran Distilleries. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m9v: I didn't steal enough to be killed over! Anyway, whatever Corellia is paying you, I'll double it!
entries.m9s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m9d: A bounty is hereby issued on a former executive of Corellia Technologies. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m8v: That teenager was crazy, I tell ya! How was I supposed to know the kid was suicidal? Gimme a break, will ya?
entries.m8s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m8d: A bounty is hereby issued on a lowlife, guilty of cruelty to an innocent youngster. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m7v: How was I supposed to know that stupid kid would take all of it at once? You can't kill me because some glitterhead got careless!
entries.m7s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m7d: A bounty is hereby issued on a glitterstim pusher responsible for the death of a prominent citizen's son. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m6v: I'm just a harmless data slicer! I don't deserve this!
entries.m6s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m6d: A bounty is hereby issued on a HoloNet pirate guilty of stealing private transmissions for purposes of blackmail. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m5v: You'll have to kill me, bounty hunter, 'cause I'm not coming with you!
entries.m5s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m5d: A bounty is hereby issued on a blockade runner wanted for smuggling spice through planetary blockades. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m4v: Leave me alone! I ain't got no fight with you, bounty hunter!
entries.m4s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m4d: A bounty is hereby issued on a space scavenger known to violently extort junk buyers. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m3v: No, wait, I'm not the clone! I'm the original!
entries.m3s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m3d: A bounty is hereby issued on a renegade clone, suspected of forging identity credits. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m2v: Shi'lax does not deserve slavery! I'll die to save her!
entries.m2s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m2d: A bounty is hereby issued on a smuggler accused of spiriting a slave out of Hutt Space. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
entries.m1v: A bounty hunter? You've gotta be kidding me! I'm a pickpocket, not a murderer!
entries.m1s: Client sends congratulations and this message:
entries.m1d: A bounty is hereby issued on a pickpocket who chose a victim unwisely. Target is believed lightly armed and low-threat. The client requests this message be given to the target before termination:
